title: Welcome to This is a Blog About Pickles

Welcome to our new blog, This is a Blog About Pickles. We hope you enjoy

title: Big, Little, and Medium Jars
description: A short description of the post.
contents:
Look at this awesome plot of common canning jars below!


library(tidyverse)
ggplot(mtcars, aes(disp, mpg)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth() +
  labs(title = "A river")



  theme(text = element_text(family = "Roboto"))


List of 1

  ..$ family       : chr "Roboto"
  ..$ face         : NULL
  ..$ colour       : NULL
  ..$ size         : NULL
  ..$ hjust        : NULL
  ..$ vjust        : NULL
  ..$ angle        : NULL
  ..$ lineheight   : NULL
  ..$ margin       : NULL
  ..$ debug        : NULL
  ..$ inherit.blank: logi FALSE
  ..- attr(*, "class")= chr [1:2] "element_text" "element"
 - attr(*, "class")= chr [1:2] "theme" "gg"
 - attr(*, "complete")= logi FALSE
 - attr(*, "validate")= logi TRUE
